title: Issue and Opinion Structure
contentPreview:
Possible Hierarchies

 1. Opinion > Opinion (child)
 2. ... Opinion > Issue > Opinion > Opinion (child)
 3. Issue > Opinion > Opinion (child)
 4. Issue > Opinion > Issue
content:
Possible Hierarchies

  1. Opinion > Opinion (child)
  2. ... Opinion > Issue > Opinion > Opinion (child)
  3. Issue > Opinion > Opinion (child)
  4. Issue > Opinion > Issue
